title: Government overspending ÂŁ40m on Big Ben
text: 15:45 I find it simply unfathomable how they come up with these staggering figures to fix a clock?I'm pretty confident you could build a 100% replica for the clock mechanics for less than £250K, add another £100K to remove and replace it, job done.if the bell needs to be re-cast (and does it?) it's not that big a job, hell, Churches over the land are having them replaced pretty regularly (our local one had it's 6 re-cast few years back for some £20K including replacing the timbers etc.) So, assuming london prices and all, say £100K should cut it.So, where do these multi-million estimates come from?
